channel.title: How do i prepare my server?
channel.description: How and what do i do to my source and client to compact it into one client then post it on runelocus? Is there a certain program that needs to be used?? please help me :(

item.title: How do i prepare my server?
item.dc:creator: @demolitiond demolitiond
item.description:
@demolitiond wrote:

so which file do i edit to make sure the client connects to my server?!?!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i prepare my server?

item.title: How do i prepare my server?
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

The source folder is for you to edit with, the Client folder is what everybody else uses to connect.

There is something in one of the files that you have to change in order for the client to connect to YOUR server, and of course the client has to go with the server.

But yeah, package the Client folder into a .rar or .zip file and send it.

A little tip I use is to make everything hidden except the run button and then package it all up, to make it easier for the user to navigate.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i prepare my server?

item.title: How do i prepare my server?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Compile. Delete java files. ZIP.

Make sure to keep the java files on your computer just in case you want to edit.
